markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Attuned Stride](/Feats.aspx?ID=2999) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 213 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Geomancer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=100)

**Prerequisites**
[Geomancer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2995); Expert in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

</column>

---

You can move freely through terrain you're attuned to. When you gain a terrain attunement benefit, you ignore difficult terrain in the corresponding type of terrain until the end of your next turn.
name: Attuned Stride
